Blog.post: today was a LONG DAY, but it was a good day. i had my favorite lunch. the end of the year is coming and i'm kinda sad. this was THE BEST school year ever!!! i love everyone. o ya, and i am still VERY confused
hee hee, its kinda stupid, and short, but it's how i feel right now "you're out or reach, but your so close"

ooooooh, if only today could be a good day. it is in sooo many ways, But i love my friends and i REALLY don't want to make anyone mad at me, but i am sooo happy. i'm sorry i can't explain more, maybe later when the time is right, hopefully not to much later. ooh, i really wish i could express my full happiness. i m soooo confused.

I hope this works!!! urlLink What Color is Your Brain? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla BLUE: At work or in school: I like to be with people, sharing with them, inspiring them, and helping them. I work and learn best when I can take into consideration people and the human element. I flourish in an atmosphere of cooperation. With friends: I always look for perfect love. I am very romantic, and I enjoy doing thoughtful things for others. I am affectionate, supportive and a good listener. With family: I like to be happy and loving. I am very sensitive to rejection from my family and to family conflicts. I really like to be well thought of and need frequent reassurance. I love intimate talks and warm feelings. i agree, lol, except with a few of the details

soooo, i haven't updataed in a VERY long time... school is out!!! it's SUMMER!!! yesterday was the Drama party...SOOO FUN!!! i got soaked in a water gun fight, and kept calling people Joe, lol. i did get a sunburn though, yuck! I LOVE DRAMA PEOPLE! i can't wait to see them all next year!!

OH MAN!!! i hate when you've wanted something to happen for a long time, but after wanting for too long you grow past it and you don't want it anymore, but after you decide that's not what you want, you can have it.
Ignore everything i said on june 1st, i still want that thing to happen!!!!

my mom and dad have been saying it, but it never really sank in until today... This is my LAST real summer. like after this summer there won't be as many family vacations or fun times hanging out at my house. this SUCKS!!! i want to be a kid again!!!
